Title: 21st Century Scholars:  Putting Computer Science, Mathematics and Engineering to Work
Abstract: The 21st Century Scholars Program is providing scholarships for students studying in the areas of computer science, mathematics and engineering (CSEM). This important program provides a vital link between the workforce needs of Danville's employers and a pool of potential employees in need of the resources to gain vital skills. Objectives are to (a) provide financial assistance for students to earn an associate's degree in a CSEM field and (b) allow area residents to prepare for jobs in the areas that impact the local economy.
